entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
